title: Long-term fasting induces metabolic and immune adaptations
authors: Wilhelmi de Toledo F. et al.
summary: Large observational study describing metabolic, inflammatory and clinical adaptations during prolonged medically supervised fasting.

title: Safety and health improvement of long-term fasting
authors: Wilhelmi de Toledo F. et al.
summary: Assessment of safety parameters and health markers in more than 1,400 subjects undergoing therapeutic fasting.

title: Physiological and psychological responses to fasting
summary: Review of physiological, psychological and metabolic responses observed during different fasting protocols.

title: Gut microbiome adaptations during fasting
summary: Exploration of gut microbial shifts during fasting and their potential implications for metabolic health.
